article_title: Will You Ever Understand Your Medical Bill?

article_metadata.description: It is hard to exaggerate how painful the medical billing process is for patients. Steven Brill, an entrepreneurial lawyer turned journalist, became one of the most famous critics of American healthcare when Time magazine published a long article by him in 2013. It was a wide ranging criticism of pretty [...]
